Wikibook

appearance

MinervaNeue the best

syntax

  • internal link
    • [[path|name]]
      • e.g. [[超普通心理学/心理學緒論|心理學緒論]]
  • numbered list
    • #
  • bullet list
    • *
  • whole paragraph indent
    • :
  • vertical line
    • ----
  • heading
    • ==h2==
    • ====h4====
  • wikipedia link
    • 英文
      • [[wikipedia:Functional psychology|Functionalism]]
    • 中文
      • [[w:可证伪性|可否證性]]
  • reference
    • <ref>this is a reference</ref>
      • 會自動標號
